name: Red and Yellow (itch)
description:
In this game we have some rules, let's start!

1. Two sides: Yellow and Red. Red always goes first.

2. Every turn you can do 30 steps. 10 rounds, 30 steps every round. 300 steps whole game.

3. When you are on neutral cell (blue), you change it's color to your color. You can't change color of your opponent's cells.

4. You can take 1 bomb, it can destroy your opponent's cells. 3x3 explosion. SPACE for explosion.

5. WASD for Red player and Arrow keys for Yellow player.

6. At the end of game, side, who has more cell with player's color, wins.

Try to play it, i'm working on it's concept and think it has some idea :)
